localize.text: “If only you could see the child's face and hold their hand one more time...”
In order to wield it the agent must have: Longing E.G.O. Gift Auto-attacks hostile entities present in the facility.

Those who leave never come back. I wish I'd said something back then.
I should’ve said, ‘I’m sorry that I let go of your hand’ and apologized, even if it didn’t mean anything."
